summary: An ordinance relating to the Alaskan Way Viaduct project and providing for the purchase of a portion of Lot 6, Block 27, Supplemental Plat of Block 27, Bell and Denny's First Addition in connection with condemnation Ordinance No. 77088 as amended by No. 77749; making an appropriation therefor as an advance from the Emergency Fund, declaring the emergency making necessary such appropriation; and providing for repayment from the Cumulative Reserve Fund.
